author: chetanm
msg: Use disabled instead of undefined for disabling the index to be used

author: violetagg
msg: Fix potential NPEs. In web app start if a problem occur prior to instanceManager initialization then:
- SCI.onStart will fail if it tries to use instanceManager
- During web app stop, StandardContext.listenerStop will fail if it tries to use instanceManager
